remarks: Lemma for ~ sinper and ~ cosper .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 23-Jan-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2014.)
statement:
sinperlem.1 $e |- ( A e. CC -> ( F ` A ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) O ( exp ` ( -u _i x. A ) ) ) / D ) ) $.
sinperlem.2 $e |- ( ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) e. CC -> ( F ` ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) ) = ( ( ( exp ` ( _i x. ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) ) ) O ( exp ` ( -u _i x. ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) ) ) ) / D ) ) $.
sinperlem $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( F ` ( A + ( K x. ( 2 x. _pi ) ) ) ) = ( F ` A ) ) $.
